about: Our old neckties are ideal for inspiration for clothing designers, authentic movie props & vintage & antique clothing enthusiasts. Although we try to source vintage & antique ties in the best of condition & quality these are old ties that have been subjected to wear, age & other factors that may affect the qualities of a necktie like being constructed by hand.
